## Similar Projects

Here is the list of other projects from the community for per-component async data fetching:

* [AsyncProps](https://github.com/ryanflorence/async-props)
* [React Async](https://github.com/andreypopp/react-async)
* [React Refetch](https://github.com/heroku/react-refetch)
* [React Transmit](https://github.com/RickWong/react-transmit)
* [Redial](https://github.com/markdalgleish/redial)
* [Relay](https://github.com/facebook/relay)
